decl.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_DECL_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_DECL_HPP 
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif 
00008 
00010 //  decl.hpp

00018 
00019 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------// 
00020 
00021 // This header implements separate compilation features as described in
00022 // http://www.boost.org/more/separate_compilation.html
00023 
00024 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/preprocessor/facilities/empty.hpp>
00026 
00027 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC)
00028     #if (defined(BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK) || defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DYN_LINK))
00029         #if defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_SOURCE)
00030             #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00031             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(T) T __export
00032             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T)  T __export
00033             #else
00034             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(T) __declspec(dllexport) T
00035             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T)  __declspec(dllexport) T
00036             #endif
00037         #else
00038             #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00039             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(T) T __import
00040             #else
00041             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(T) __declspec(dllimport) T
00042             #endif
00043         #endif
00044         #if defined(BOOST_WARCHIVE_SOURCE)
00045             #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00046             #define BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) T __export
00047             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) T __export
00048             #else
00049             #define BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) __declspec(dllexport) T
00050             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) __declspec(dllexport) T
00051             #endif
00052         #else
00053             #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00054             #define BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) T __import
00055             #else
00056             #define BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) __declspec(dllimport) T
00057             #endif
00058         #endif
00059         #if !defined(BOOST_WARCHIVE_SOURCE) && !defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_SOURCE)
00060             #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00061             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) T __import
00062             #else
00063             #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) __declspec(dllimport) T
00064             #endif
00065         #endif
00066     #endif
00067 #endif // BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC
00068 
00069 #if ! defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL)
00070     #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(T) T
00071 #endif
00072 #if ! defined(BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL)
00073     #define BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) T
00074 #endif
00075 #if ! defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL)
00076     #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(T) T
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_DECL_HPP
